abstract: Brazilian agriculture minister Katia Abreu responds to perceived sexist comment by Sen Jose Serra at fancy dinner party by throwing wine in his face; episode reflects ongoing conversation about entrenched sexism and self-absorption of politicians in country, which is suffering from range of economic, health and political crises.
lead_paragraph: A squabble in which one of Brazil’s most powerful men insulted one of its most powerful women, and wound up with a face full of wine, touched a nerve in a country with a tradition of sexist comments.

headline.main: Tossed Glass of Wine Hits Nerve in Brazil
headline.print_headline: Tossed Glass of Wine Hits Nerve in Brazil

snippet: A squabble in which one of Brazil’s most powerful men insulted one of its most powerful women, and wound up with a face full of wine, touched a nerve in a country with a tradition of sexist comments.
